forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Partly sunny. High near 46, with temperatures falling to around 38 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 7pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 23. Northwest wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow between 2pm and 3pm, then a slight chance of rain and snow. Mostly sunny, with a high near 38. Northwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
